entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
